### Explanation

Flight prices from London airports to Madrid are fairly consistent as we see median prices peak in July and lowest in September. It is interesting to see the large variability in minimum prices from Heathrow compared to Stansted where prices are relatively stable which can reflect types of carrier providers or consumer behaviours.
